message: - Portrait lock mode does not display Login dialog on first launch
- Crash when loading a topic with > 100 unread messages

PLEASE DO NOT POST BUG REPORTS HERE, THEY WILL BE DELETED. please post bug reports in the "Bug Reports" topic. This topic is for me to list currently known issues so you know if a bug you are experiencing is known or not.
- Launching app in Portrait mode does not display "Groups and Topics" toolbar button until device is rotated to landscape and back
- Deleting messages causes crash (due to new message layout)
Keyboard input error when going to new DM convo from growl if keyboard is raised
